segments.text: IMPF Bank , Li Lan speaking , how may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Ms Li , this is Mr Peng .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hello , Mr Peng , how nice to hear from you again . What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll be coming in tomorrow to make a rather large cash withdrawal , it's for payroll .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 500,000 RIB . Do you need me to give you my account number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that's OK . I've got all of your information here on the screen in front of me . The money will be ready and waiting for you tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks very much for your help , Li Lan . See you tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
